# Hubql

> Product-focused software studio building modern web applications, APIs, and intelligent automation systems for startups and fast-moving companies.

Hubql helps bring visions to life through collaborative platforms, visual applications, and workflow automation - crafted with care, focus, and creativity. Based in the DACH region, we specialize in rapid MVP development using modern technologies like React, Next.js, and Supabase.

## Services

- [Collaborative Web Applications](https://www.hubql.com/collaborative-web-application): Real-time platforms, dashboards, and multiplayer workspaces
- [3D Web Applications](https://www.hubql.com/3d-web-application): WebGL visualizations, product configurators, industrial tools
- [APIs & Documentation](https://www.hubql.com/apis): RESTful and GraphQL API development with automated docs
- [Intelligent Automation](https://www.hubql.com/intelligent-automation-systems): Workflow automation with n8n and integrations
- [Web Design](https://www.hubql.com/web-design): UI/UX design, wireframing, and design systems
- [Supabase MVP Development](https://www.hubql.com/supabase-mvp): Rapid MVP builds with Supabase backend

## Portfolio

- [Schema Visualizer](https://www.schemavisualizer.dev/): Data visualization SaaS tool
- [Hoot](https://www.hoot.org.uk/): Job portal and dashboard for schools
- [RConnect](https://www.rconnect.tech/): Developer marketing website
- [APIPT](https://www.apipt.dev/): Developer tool landing page

## Technology

Core stack: React, Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Supabase, Node.js, n8n, AWS, Cloudflare Workers.

- [Home](https://www.hubql.com/): Main landing page
